title: Anyone know if Kindred can "hunt" the Herald?
body: With the new Rift Herald, can Wolf's passive mark the RH as a target? Just curious.

replies.body: Wolf won't go after Rift Herald. From 5.22 onwards though he will start hunting Baron after 20 minutes if Kindred are at 6 stacks or more.
Since the Rift Herald thread has been closed... will Mordekaiser PLEASE be able to get a Rift Herald pet?
If he doesn't, he can get the dragon and teleport to his top lane with the rift herland buff. easy turret.
they should add the same thing for drake so people would actually consider doing early drake teamfights
Doubt it, it doesn't mark Dragon or Baron.
